item.title: Hello!
item.description: Recently, I had the idea to write some articles and share my experiences as software developer and architect in a large software company. So, stay tuned for updates… ðŸ˜‰

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, my name is Wilko and I’m a a professional software developer and architect with more than 10 years of experience in software development. In this blog I want to share my view on certain topics and experiences in software development or related topics. This blog is powered by Hugo and hosted on github-pages.
